items.label: 539f760bec4f024411ed1b11
items.description:
Defined as to apply to any commercial, residential, or small industrial consumers served electrical energy by the City of Pomona, whose electrical service require more than 25 KVA. 
Type of Service: single or three phase 60 cycle at available secondary voltage.
An operating and capital cost adjustment factor shall be added to the rates set out below, which factor shall be computed by: A) The Electric fund balance drops below $350,000. The formula for calculating OCA would be $350,000 less the months fund balance divided by the kWh sales for the month. B) The Electric fund balance goes above $700,000. The formula for calculating OCA would be changed to $700,000 less the months fund balance divided by the kWh sales for the month.
The minimum monthly charge shall be $10.00 per month on a single phase service where not more than 25 KVA transformer capacity is required. When more than 25 KVA transformer capacity is required or on three phase service the minimum monthly charge shall be $25.00.
items.name: General Service Small
